page.title: 07My Family
page.content: My Mum and Dad are called{Sandra}and{ {Robert Hopley.}My Mum likes knitting and gardening and my Dad likes going on holiday and burnt toast.My Grandma is called{Mime}and we go to see her every Tuesday.My Brother is very nice; he buys me anything I want.I have four cousins:{Jane,David,Matthew}and{Andrew {Jane}is narly eight and{David}is thirteen,{Matthew}is four and{Andrew} is three.My Auntie{Liz}is a teacher and she works full time at Boothferry Middle School.My Uncle{Randle}likes flying{Davids}aeroplane with him and gardening,just like my mum.My Auntie{ {Jan}is very nice. My Uncle{Nigel} is sometimes in a mood but always mends our bikes,organ,and computer for us.
